title: Understanding Socialisation & Nature Vs Nurture (STUDENT SPECIAL)
description: In this episode, Eric Miller discusses the importance of the socialisation process, gender expectations during this period, feral children and also the fundamentals of the nature versus nurture debate.
itunes:author: Matthew Wilkin
itunes:subtitle: In this episode, Eric Miller discusses the importance of the socialisation process, gender expectations during this period, feral children and also the fundamentals of the nature versus nurture debate.
